data.why:
DirFiles.pl Command line utility for MS Windows. Lists directory
    and file info in comma separated (.csv) format to a file on a
    Windows system

    Switches to append to output file, include directory filenames,
    select particular extensions, show help, start at a target
    directory, output to a named file, limit processing to n levels of
    subdirectory.

meta.subject: PAUSE ID request (AMGARLAND; Andrew M. Garland)
